timeline.bodyText:
hey @handreyrc - just doing a quick look at the code, at what this show method does, not really sure if that fix, even if works, is the best one yet.
I mean, on the first line it "cancels" the hide (scheduled) task, if any, But in case zoomLevelInit is true, then it "forces" to perform a hide (by scheduling the task).
I don't really have the detail for this, so just asking, but it looks redundant... maybe can we just call the hide() method, as for first line instead of cancelHide(), and remove the use of the new flag zoomLevelInit? Does that makes sense?
Again, just brainstorming, feel free to provide your feedback please! thanks! :+1
timeline.author: romartin

replies.bodyText: Hey @romartin - I wasn't able to get rid of the flag, but I was able to improve the logic and make it easier to follow instead. Could you check it again please?
